meanings.sent1: I have many shoeboxes in my closet.
meanings.sent2: Please put your new shoes in the shoebox.
meanings.sent3: The shoeboxes in the store were all different colors.
meanings.sent4: Her love for shoes spilled out of the overflowing shoeboxes.
meanings.sent5: The shoeboxes neatly lined up made a colorful display.

meanings.definition: To pack or store in a shoebox.
meanings.sent1: I will shoebox all my sneakers for the move.
meanings.sent2: She decided to shoebox her collection of heels.
meanings.sent3: He tried to shoebox all his sandals, but they didn't fit.
meanings.sent4: The memories shoeboxed in her mind were precious.
meanings.sent5: They shoeboxed the memories of their first date.
